## {.sidebar}

```{python}
from shiny import render, ui
ui.input_select("x", "Variable:",
                choices=["bill_length_mm", "bill_depth_mm"])
ui.input_select("dist", "Distribution:", choices=["hist", "kde"])
ui.input_checkbox("rug", "Show rug marks", value = False)
```
